heading: HB00185
0: AN ACT REQUIRING THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM TO DECLARE DIVIDENDS, FURTHER AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 1161 ACCORDINGLY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00185
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING THE SOCIAL SECURITY SYSTEM TO DECLARE DIVIDENDS, FURTHER AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 1161 ACCORDINGLY AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : OLIVAREZ, ERIC L.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated by the TWG on 2016-10-19
          -SSS does not declare dividends because unlike GSIS, it does not offer life insurance to its members
          -TWG on bills proposing amendments to both GSIS and SSS, chaired by Rep. Mariño
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-07-26
